sentences.en: Broadleaf evergreen tree such as evergreen magnolia, castor tree, etc.
sentences.cn: 阔叶长绿树包括长绿木兰 、 蓖麻树等等.

sentences.en: Classes and Magnolia grandiflora quietly listening to the kids happy sound study.
sentences.cn: 上课了,广玉兰静静的听着孩子们快乐的读书声.

sentences.en: Comparative anatomical studies on the vessel elements of Chinese Magnolia and Michelia.
sentences.cn: 中国木兰属和含笑属导管分子的比较解剖.

sentences.en: General tomb a thing of the past two Magnolia Lake.
sentences.cn: 将军墓列为木兰湖两大历史陈迹.

sentences.en: It ate pine needles, seeds, fruit, twigs and magnolia leaves.
sentences.cn: 它吃很多种植物,比如松树叶, 种子, 水果, 嫩树枝,还有木兰叶.

sentences.en: Its huge columns were wreathed with laurel and magnolia.
sentences.cn: 其巨大的立柱为月桂和木兰花所环绕。

sentences.en: Its ingredients include Xanthium fruit, magnolia flower, wild chrysanthemum and licorice root.
sentences.cn: 其成份包括苍耳子 、 木兰花 、 野菊花和甘草.

sentences.en: Magnolia Lake waters wide, bright and clean, good water quality.
sentences.cn: 木兰湖水域宽广, 清澈明亮, 水质优良.

sentences.en: Objective : Compare Jiang Magnolia Puerariae from different producing areas by fingerprint of GC.
sentences.cn: 目的 比较不同产地姜厚朴气相指纹图谱,以确定最佳指纹图谱模式.

sentences.en: Some of the magnolia leaves have a bit of shimmer . . . I couldn’t resist enhancing many of them with a little metallic craft paint.
sentences.cn: 我在一些木兰树叶上涂了一层闪光剂，我实在是忍不住在他们上面涂上一点金属色手工颜料。

sentences.en: Standout alone, a set of white yulan magnolia tree.
sentences.cn: 鹤立鸡群独一枝, 绿树映衬玉兰白.

sentences.en: Sunshellone's fingerprint, is like magnolia blossoms in the End of the World.
sentences.cn: 阳光的指纹, 好似木兰花,开在海角.

sentences.en: The magnolia flowers are whispering as the wind waves.
sentences.cn: 玉兰花儿们在清风的吹拂下窃窃私语.

sentences.en: The system tissue culture and rapid propagation of Magnolia denudata was established.
sentences.cn: 试验建立了白玉兰离体繁殖体系.

sentences.en: Tree - lined campus, Cotton Tree Drive , Tu Yan, Magnolia fragrance, the environment elegant.
sentences.cn: 校园 绿树成荫, 红棉吐艳, 玉兰飘香, 环境幽雅.

sentences.en: Yulan magnolia can adapt to a variety of soils.
sentences.cn: 玉兰花能适应各种土壤.

trans.tran_cn: [植] 木兰，木兰花，玉兰类的植物，奶白色
trans.tran_en: a tree with large white, pink, yellow, or purple flowers
